page.title: 12School Based Naturalists
page.content: A local farmer,noticing that children's knowledge of the countryside was weak, decided to set up a shceme to improve it.He set up a trust fund and with the help of the M.S.C employed six enthusiasts to go into schools in the immediate area and work with the chilldren.Each class in nine small schools gets the assistance of one naturalist each day during the week.They take out small groups of children and go for walks,looking at the environment and the changes throughout the year.They may set up clubs or organise family walks, one set up a young ornothologist's club and took out the members bird spotting.They may set up environmental areas in classrooms or around the school they have succesfully heightened the intrest and knowledge of the children.
